title: Summer of the seventeenth doll [Australian Opera]
brief_description: Ray Lawler’s classic play, set in Melbourne in the 1950’s, is brought to life in this operatic adaptation recorded at the Playhouse, Victorian Arts Centre. Cast includes Elizabeth Campbell, Gillian Sullivan, Natalie Jones, Eilene Hannan, Barry Ryan, Gary Rowley and Nicholas Todorovic. Music by the Victorian State Opera is composed and conducted by Richard Mills. Performance produced and directed by Peter Butler.
